Associate Newsletter September 2013
No More Downtime Between Projects: MBO Partners and Work Market Announce Partnership Say goodbye to downtime between projects! MBO Partners just entered into an incredibly exciting, strategic partnership with Work Market <http://www.prweb.com/releases/2013/9/prweb11105021.htm> that will revolutionize Enterprise independent contractor engagement and deployment. The first enterprise-scale solution of its kind, the offering combines the trust, power and experience of MBO’s Fortune 1000 approved contractor engagement and compliance platform with Work Market’s state-of-the-art marketplace and work distribution technology. The two companies will market the integrated MBO Work Market offering as a “Managed Contractor Cloud” solution to all current and new clients seeking a world-class contractor engagement solution. Stay tuned for more details in the coming months, on the rollout and what this will mean for you and building your project pipeline. Read the full press release <http://www.prweb.com/releases/2013/9/prweb11105021.htm>
<http://www.prweb.com/releases/2013/9/prweb11105021.htm>
The Data is In: 17.7 Million Independents and Counting Last week, MBO Partners released its third annual State of Independence in America report <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf>, uncovering some surprising statistics about America’s self-employed workers. The most in-depth study on independents to date, the 2013 SOI delves into demographic and industry breakdowns as well as overall economic impact (over $1 Trillion). We’d like to give you an early look at the data; you can view the full report <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf>, read the press release <http://finance.yahoo.com/news/mbo-partners-state-independence-report-110000067.html> or browse our new infographics <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/americas-self-employed.html> to get the full story. If you have any questions about the data, or want to learn more, contact the Marketing Team at communications@mbopartners.com <mailto:communications@mbopartners.com>. MBO Partners Recognized as Largest Independent Contractor Management Company in U.S. MBO Partners Enterprise Solutions division has been recognized as the largest Independent Contractor Evaluation and Compliance (Agent of Record) Service Provider in the country in the Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA) first-ever Payrolling and Independent Contractor Evaluation / Compliance Landscape Report. Among the providers recognized, MBO Partners was the only provider that focused primarily on the Agent of Record offering, and was listed ahead of other providers, in terms of total spend. Read More <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-recognized-largest-independent-contractor-management-company-us-staffing-industry>
